actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Rehabilitation Act of 1973 to provide for a program of wage supplements for handicapped individuals.
short_title: Wage Supplements for Handicapped Individuals Act

summary.text: Wage Supplements for Handicapped Individuals Act - Amends the Rehabilitation Act of 1973 to authorize the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to conduct demonstration projects, either directly or by way of arrangement with public or private agencies, for the payment of wage supplements to handicapped individuals who are employed in sheltered workshops or work activity centers which meet certain standards, including any promulgated under this Act by the Secretary jointly with the Secretary of Labor.

titles.title: Wage Supplements for Handicapped Individuals Act
A bill to amend the Rehabilitation Act of 1973 to provide for a program of wage supplements for handicapped individuals.
